alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 12:17PM CDT until May 11 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... South central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1216 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Delhi to near Crowville to near Gilbert, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Delhi around 1220 PM CDT. Waverly around 1225 PM CDT. Tendal and Newlight around 1230 PM CDT. Tallulah, Newellton, Afton, Somerset and Lake Bruin around 1245 PM CDT. Mansford and Omega around 1250 PM CDT. Eagle Bend and Mound around 100 PM CDT. Vicksburg, Le Tourneau and Yokena around 105 PM CDT. Port Gibson around 110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Delta and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
